Class MinigameVanHelsing

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.arcade.MinigameVanHelsing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArcadeMinigame

    public class MinigameVanHelsing
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArcadeMinigame
    A hunt minigame, where you have to fastly kill vampire bats.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
